009
010package Ch08_Binary_Regions;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
013
014import java.util.List;
015
016import ij.IJ;
017import ij.ImagePlus;
018import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
019import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
020import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
021import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
022import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.hulls.AxisAlignedBoundingBox;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
028import imagingbook.common.regions.BinaryRegion;
029import imagingbook.common.regions.RegionContourSegmentation;
030import imagingbook.core.plugin.IjPluginName;
031import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
032
033/**
034 * <p>
035 * This ImageJ plugin creates a binary region segmentation, calculates the
036 * center and major axis and subsequently the major axis-aligned bounding box
037 * for each binary region (connected component). See Sec. 8.6.4 of [1] for
038 * additional details. Requires a binary image. Zero-value pixels are considered
039 * background, all other pixels are foreground. Display lookup tables (LUTs) are
040 * not considered. The resulting bounding box is shown as a vector overlay on
041 * top of a new image, the original image is not modified.
042 * If no image is currently open, the plugin optionally loads a suitable
043 * sample image.
044 * </p>
045 * <p>
046 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
047 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
048 * </p>
049 * 
050 * @author WB
051 * @version 2022/06/23
052 */
053@IjPluginName("Axis-Aligned Bounding Box")
054public class Axis_Aligned_Bounding_Box implements PlugInFilter {
055
056        /** Color of the bounding-box outline. */
057        public static BasicAwtColor DrawingColor = BasicAwtColor.Blue;
058        public static double StrokeWidth = 0.5;
059
060        private ImagePlus im;
061        
062        /**
063         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
064         * is currently open.
065         */
066        public Axis_Aligned_Bounding_Box() {
067                if (noCurrentImage()) {
068                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.ToolsSmall);
069                }
070        }
071        
072        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
073        
074        @Override
075        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
076                this.im = im;
077                return DOES_8G; 
078        }
079        
080        @Override
081        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
082                if (!IjUtils.isBinary(ip)) {
083                        IJ.showMessage("Plugin requires a binary image!");
084                        return;
085                }
086
087                if (!runDialog())
088                        return;
089                
090                RegionContourSegmentation segmenter = new RegionContourSegmentation((ByteProcessor) ip);
091                List<BinaryRegion> regions = segmenter.getRegions();
092                if (regions.isEmpty()) {
093                        IJ.error("No regions detected!");
094                        return;
095                }
096                
097                ImageProcessor ip2 = ip.duplicate();
098                ip2.add(128);   // brighten
099                
100                // draw bounding boxes as vector overlay
101
102                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
103                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, DrawingColor.getColor()));
104                
105                for (BinaryRegion r : regions) {
106                        if (r.getSize() > 5) {
107                                AxisAlignedBoundingBox box = new AxisAlignedBoundingBox(r);
108                                ola.addShapes(box.getShapes());
109                        }
110                }
111
112                im.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
113        }
114
115        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
116
117        private boolean runDialog() {
118                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(Region_Contours_Demo.class.getSimpleName());
119                gd.addEnumChoice("Drawing color", DrawingColor);
120                gd.addNumericField("Stroke width", StrokeWidth, 1);
121
122                gd.showDialog();
123                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
124                        return false;
125                }
126
127                DrawingColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
128                StrokeWidth = gd.getNextNumber();
129                return true;
130        }
131
132}
